chat.content:
Help me to prove a theorem in Coq, based on provided proof states including hypotheses and goals. Give a complete proof in only one single code block without explanations, extra definitions. Give a complete proof in one response, only give the proof body, without repeating the definition and "Proof.". Avoid existing names when using intros. Write the commands separately, without ";" and "[cmd|cmd]". Use bullets for structure, NEVER use "{" and "}". When -, + and * are used out, proceed to double versions like --, ++, etc. For example, given proof state:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m
============================
m + S n = S n + m
The hypotheses n, m: nat and IHn: m + n = n + m are given first, then the goal, m + S n = S n + m, separated by =. Expect a response like: 
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.``` 
You do not intros any terms because all terms have already been introduced.

When I give:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m
============================
n, m: nat
your answer should be like:
```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```
Definitions and lemmas related to the proof will be provided, use them accordingly.


Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
n: nat
x: pos n
i: nat
v: Vector.t (list bool) n

Goal:
(i, empty_stack) // (i, v) ->> (3 + i, v[nil/x])

Premises:
Module Vector := Struct Inductive t (A : Type) : nat -> Type := nil : t A 0 | cons : A -> forall n : nat, t A n -> t A (S n) Definition t_rect : forall (A : Type) (P : forall n : nat, vec A n -> Type), P 0 vec_nil -> (forall (h : A) (n : nat) (t : vec A n), P n t -> P (S n) (h ## t)) -> forall (n : nat) (t : vec A n), P n t. Definition t_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : forall n : nat, vec A n -> Prop), P 0 vec_nil -> (forall (h : A) (n : nat) (t : vec A n), P n t -> P (S n) (h ## t)) ->
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
Inductive bool : Set := true : bool | false : bool
Notation pos := Fin.t
Inductive t : nat -> Set := F1 : forall n : nat, pos (S n) | FS : forall n : nat, pos n -> pos (S n) Arguments Fin.t _%nat_scope Arguments Fin.F1 {n}%nat_scope Arguments Fin.FS {n}%nat_scope
empty_stack = POP x i (3 + i) :: PUSH x Zero :: POP x i i :: nil : list (bsm_instr n)
bsm_compute_PUSH : forall (n : nat) (P : nat * list (bsm_instr n)) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (b : bool) (v : vec (list bool) n) (st : nat * vec (list bool) n), (i, PUSH x b :: nil) <sc P -> P // (1 + i, v[(b :: v#>x)/x]) -> > st -> P // (i, v) -> > st
bsm_compute_POP_1 : forall (n : nat) (P : nat * list (bsm_instr n)) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (p q : nat) (ll : list bool) (v : vec (list bool) n) (st : nat * vec (list bool) n), (i, POP x p q :: nil) <sc P -> v#>x = One :: ll -> P // (1 + i, v[ll/x]) -> > st -> P // (i, v) -> > st
bsm_compute_POP_any : forall (n : nat) (P : nat * list (bsm_instr n)) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (p q : nat) (b : bool) (ll : list bool) (v : vec (list bool) n) (st : nat * vec (list bool) n), (i, POP x p q :: nil) <sc P -> v#>x = b :: ll -> p = 1 + i -> P // (1 + i, v[ll/x]) -> > st -> P // (i, v) -> > st
bsm_compute_POP_E : forall (n : nat) (P : nat * list (bsm_instr n)) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (p q : nat) (v : vec (list bool) n) (st : nat * vec (list bool) n), (i, POP x p q :: nil) <sc P -> v#>x = nil -> P // (q, v) -> > st -> P // (i, v) -> > st
bsm_steps_PUSH_inv : forall (n k : nat) (P : nat * list (bsm_instr n)) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (b : bool) (v : vec (list bool) n) (st : nat * vec (list bool) n), (i, PUSH x b :: nil) <sc P -> st <> (i, v) -> P // (i, v) -[k] -> st -> {a : nat | a < k /\ P // (1 + i, v[(b :: v#>x)/x]) -[a] -> st}
bsm_compute_POP_0 : forall (n : nat) (P : nat * list (bsm_instr n)) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (p q : nat) (ll : list bool) (v : vec (list bool) n) (st : nat * vec (list bool) n), (i, POP x p q :: nil) <sc P -> v#>x = Zero :: ll -> P // (p, v[ll/x]) -> > st -> P // (i, v) -> > st
bsm_steps_POP_1_inv : forall (n a : nat) (P : nat * list (bsm_instr n)) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (p q : nat) (ll : list bool) (v : vec (list bool) n) (st : nat * vec (list bool) n), (i, POP x p q :: nil) <sc P -> v#>x = One :: ll -> st <> (i, v) -> P // (i, v) -[a] -> st -> {b : nat | b < a /\ P // (1 + i, v[ll/x]) -[b] -> st}
bsm_steps_POP_any_inv : forall (n a : nat) (P : nat * list (bsm_instr n)) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (p q : nat) (b : bool) (ll : list bool) (v : vec (list bool) n) (st : nat * vec (list bool) n), (i, POP x p q :: nil) <sc P -> v#>x = b :: ll -> p = 1 + i -> st <> (i, v) -> P // (i, v) -[a] -> st -> {b0 : nat | b0 < a /\ P // (1 + i, v[ll/x]) -[b0] -> st}
in_bsm_sss_push : forall (n i : nat) (x : pos n) (b : bool) (v : vec (list bool) n), bsm_sss (PUSH x b) (i, v) (1 + i, v[(b :: v#>x)/x])
bsm_steps_POP_E_inv : forall (n a : nat) (P : nat * list (bsm_instr n)) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (p q : nat) (v : vec (list bool) n) (st : nat * vec (list bool) n), (i, POP x p q :: nil) <sc P -> v#>x = nil -> st <> (i, v) -> P // (i, v) -[a] -> st -> {b : nat | b < a /\ P // (q, v) -[b] -> st}
bsm_steps_POP_0_inv : forall (n a : nat) (P : nat * list (bsm_instr n)) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (p q : nat) (ll : list bool) (v : vec (list bool) n) (st : nat * vec (list bool) n), (i, POP x p q :: nil) <sc P -> v#>x = Zero :: ll -> st <> (i, v) -> P // (i, v) -[a] -> st -> {b : nat | b < a /\ P // (p, v[ll/x]) -[b] -> st}
bsm_sss_sind : forall (n : nat) (P : bsm_instr n -> bsm_state n -> bsm_state n -> SProp), (forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (p q : nat) (v : vec (list bool) n), v#>x = nil -> P (POP x p q) (i, v) (q, v)) -> (forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (p q : nat) (v : vec (list bool) n) (ll : list bool), v#>x = Zero :: ll -> P (POP x p q) (i, v) (p, v[ll/x])) ->...-> P b b0 b1
bsm_sss_ind : forall (n : nat) (P : bsm_instr n -> bsm_state n -> bsm_state n -> Prop), (forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (p q : nat) (v : vec (list bool) n), v#>x = nil -> P (POP x p q) (i, v) (q, v)) -> (forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (p q : nat) (v : vec (list bool) n) (ll : list bool), v#>x = Zero :: ll -> P (POP x p q) (i, v) (p, v[ll/x])) ->...-> P b b0 b1
Inductive bsm_sss (n : nat) : bsm_instr n -> bsm_state n -> bsm_state n -> Prop := in_bsm_sss_pop_E : forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (p q : nat) (v : vec (list bool) n), v#>x = nil -> bsm_sss (POP x p q) (i, v) (q, v) | in_bsm_sss_pop_0 : forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (p q : nat) (v : vec (list bool) n) (ll : list bool), v#>x = Zero :: ll -> bsm_sss (POP x p q) (i, v) (p, v[ll/x]) | in_bsm_sss_pop_1 : forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (p q : nat) (v : vec (list bool) n) (ll : list bool),...
in_bsm_sss_pop_1 : forall (n i : nat) (x : pos n) (p q : nat) (v : vec (list bool) n) (ll : list bool), v#>x = One :: ll -> bsm_sss (POP x p q) (i, v) (1 + i, v[ll/x])
in_bsm_sss_pop_E : forall (n i : nat) (x : pos n) (p q : nat) (v : vec (list bool) n), v#>x = nil -> bsm_sss (POP x p q) (i, v) (q, v)
in_bsm_sss_pop_0 : forall (n i : nat) (x : pos n) (p q : nat) (v : vec (list bool) n) (ll : list bool), v#>x = Zero :: ll -> bsm_sss (POP x p q) (i, v) (p, v[ll/x])
BSM_HALTING = fun P : BSM_PROBLEM => let (n, s) := P in let (i, s0) := s in let (P0, v) := s0 in sss_terminates (bsm_sss (n:=n)) (i, P0) (i, v) : BSM_PROBLEM -> Prop
subcode_cons_invert_left : forall (X : Type) (Q : code X) (i : nat) (I : X) (l : list X), (i, I :: l) <sc Q -> (i, I :: nil) <sc Q /\ (S i, l) <sc Q
VectorSpec.append_splitat : forall (v0 : vec ?A ?n) (w : vec ?A ?m) (vw : vec ?A (?n + ?m)), VectorDef.splitat ?n vw = (v0, w) -> vw = VectorDef.append v0 w where ?A : [n : nat x : pos n i : nat v : vec (list bool) n |- Type] ?n : [n : nat x : pos n i : nat v : vec (list bool) n |- nat] ?m : [n : nat x : pos n i : nat v : vec (list bool) n |- nat]
pos_S_inv : forall p : pos (S ?n), (p = pos0) + {q : pos ?n | p = pos_nxt q} where ?n : [n : nat x : pos n i : nat v : vec (list bool) n |- nat]
VectorSpec.splitat_append : forall (v0 : vec ?A ?n) (w : vec ?A ?m), VectorDef.splitat ?n (VectorDef.append v0 w) = (v0, w) where ?A : [n : nat x : pos n i : nat v : vec (list bool) n |- Type] ?n : [n : nat x : pos n i : nat v : vec (list bool) n |- nat] ?m : [n : nat x : pos n i : nat v : vec (list bool) n |- nat]
VectorSpec.append_comm_cons : forall (v0 : vec ?A ?n) (w : vec ?A ?m) (a : ?A), a ## VectorDef.append v0 w = VectorDef.append (a ## v0) w where ?A : [n : nat x : pos n i : nat v : vec (list bool) n |- Type] ?n : [n : nat x : pos n i : nat v : vec (list bool) n |- nat] ?m : [n : nat x : pos n i : nat v : vec (list bool) n |- nat]
subcode_app_invert_right : forall (X : Type) (j : nat) (Q1 Q2 : list X) (i : nat) (I : X), (i, I :: nil) <sc (j, Q1 ++ Q2) -> (i, I :: nil) <sc (j, Q1) \/ (i, I :: nil) <sc (length Q1 + j, Q2)
VectorSpec.eta : forall v0 : vec ?A (S ?n), v0 = VectorDef.hd v0 ## VectorDef.tl v0 where ?A : [n : nat x : pos n i : nat v : vec (list bool) n |- Type] ?n : [n : nat x : pos n i : nat v : vec (list bool) n |- nat]
VectorSpec.uncons_cons : forall (a : ?A) (v0 : vec ?A ?n), VectorDef.uncons (a ## v0) = (a, v0) where ?A : [n : nat x : pos n i : nat v : vec (list bool) n |- Type] ?n : [n : nat x : pos n i : nat v : vec (list bool) n |- nat]
VectorDef.splitat : forall l r : nat, vec ?A (l + r) -> vec ?A l * vec ?A r where ?A : [n : nat x : pos n i : nat v : vec (list bool) n |- Type]
pos_both : forall n m : nat, pos (n + m) -> pos n + pos m
bsm_state = fun n : nat => (nat * vec (list bool) n)%type : nat -> Set Arguments bsm_state _%nat_scope
sss_loop_sound : forall (instr : Set) (data : Type) (one_step : instr -> nat * data -> nat * data -> Prop) (P : nat * list instr) (pre : data -> Prop) (spec : data -> data -> Prop) (f : data -> data) (C1 C2 : data -> Prop), (forall x : data, pre x -> {C1 x} + {C2 x}) -> forall i p : nat, (forall x : data, pre x -> C1 x -> sss_compute one_step P (i, x) (i, f x) /\ pre (f x)) -> (forall x : data, pre x -> C2 x -> exists y : data, sss_compute one_step P (i, x) (p, y) /\ spec x y) ->...-> exists (n : nat) (y : data), sss_compute one_step P (i, x) (p, y) /\ spec (iter f x n) y

```coq
apply bsm_compute_POP_E with (P:=(i, empty_stack)).
- apply subcode_cons_invert_left with (l:=PUSH x Zero :: POP x i i :: nil).
  simpl. auto.
- simpl. auto.
- apply bsm_compute_PUSH with (P:=(i, PUSH x Zero :: POP x i i :: nil)).
  + apply subcode_cons_invert_left with (l:=POP x i i :: nil).
    simpl. auto.
  + simpl. apply bsm_sss_sind.
    * intros. exact H.
    * intros. exact H0.
  + apply bsm_compute_POP_0 with (P:=(3 + i, POP x i i :: nil)).
    * simpl. auto.
    * reflexivity.
    * simpl. apply bsm_sss_sind.
      -- intros. exact H.
      -- intros. exact H0.
```
